Articles.Content: Hey, it\'s Warshawski. I\'ve decided I\'d like to make parts, but one small problem.... all the programs that there are guides for cost money, and Blender does not have a guide. Can anyone recommend a free program that works well? Or make a blender guide?

Well you\'d be best to go with blender. It\'s UV mapping is VERY powerful and good.

The wiki is kinda vague yes, but go and learn the basics of blender in general first. It will get you miles and miles. Blender.org and youtube have excellent tutorials (use 2.9)
